item.title: Monument Valley III free DLC ‘The Garden of Life’ announced
item.content:encoded:
ustwo games has announced Monument Valley III free downloadable content “The Garden of Life.” It will launch across all platforms on December 3, alongside the game’s return to iOS and Android.

Here is an overview of the content, via ustwo games:

About

From December 3, players on mobile will once again be able to experience the signature beauty and mind-bending puzzles of Monument Valley III, including “The Garden of Life” expansion, allowing both new and returning fans to enjoy the critically acclaimed game wherever they are.

Monument Valley III has captivated critics and players alike, earning widespread praise for its ingenious puzzle design, stunning aesthetic, and evocative soundtrack. It has been nominated for multiple awards, including Best Mobile Game at the Develop:Star Awards, Game of the Year at the Pocket Gamer Mobile Game Awards, and most recently for Best Green Tech at the Playing for the Planet Awards.

The Garden of Life is a free expansion that will see players guide our heroine Noor through even more breathtaking, impossible landscapes – manipulating structures and shifting perspectives to uncover hidden paths and solve intricate puzzles.

Key Features

  • Mind-Bending New Chapters – “The Garden of Life” will add four new additional story chapters to Noor’s voyage, with some of the most inspiring and beautiful puzzles in the Monument Valley series.
  • Hidden Optional Puzzles – For the first time in the Monument Valley series, players can discover a collection of hidden bonus puzzles. Join Boatem as you journey across the floating village in search of them.
  • Return to Mobile – “The Garden of Life” will also be available on Android and iOS, as Monument Valley III makes its long awaited return to the platforms on the same day.

Monument Valley III is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam, and will return to iOS and Android on December 3.
